column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a Chicago deep dish virgin
column2: this was my first taste of an authentic pie. Â It was one of the highlights of our trip! This place was amazing
column3: the charm of the inside sets the mood
column4: and the pizza just brings it home. It was SO amazing. I was pumped when I saw that we can actually ordered them online to be shipped home. It has taken my online shopping problem to a whole new level
